summary: Adds a chest containing a set of gear for every character
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a chest in the entrance hall of Helgen Keep which contains armor sets for each character type.

The heavy armor is named \"Dragonborn\"
The light armor is named \"Dovahkin\"
The mage armor is named \"Psiijicborn\"

I personally don\'t feel the armor is overpowered.
If you feel otherwise please say so in the comments and I may make changes.
All the items are upgradeable, but not craftable.
If you want the items without restarting you\'ll have to add them via console.

Typing in the console \"help dragonborn 0\" will give you a list of all the heavy armor and weapons.
Typing \"help dovahkin 0\" will give you a list of all the light armor.
Typing \"help psiijicborn 0\" will give you a list of all the mage armor.


As a side note, this mod will not give you a boost in gold for a starting character, as all of the items are worth nothing.

The mod is also on the Steam Workshop if that\'s how you prefer to download your mods.
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=9370]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=9370[/url]
author: Maddo3
